content:
The example ConceptMap FHIR-v3-Address-Use (http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/101) should be a mapping from the FHIR CodeSystem to the HL7 v3 AddressUse Code System. But its ConceptMap.purpose = "To help implementers map from HL7 v3/CDA to FHIR".
So its ConceptMap.purpose value should be corrected.
@Lin Zhang Do you want to submit a Jira issue for this?
Sorry, it's not available for me. Would you mind do me a favor? Thanks @Rob Hausam
@Lin Zhang Submitting Jira trackers should be available for everyone. You just need to register (which is free). What's blocking you?
@Lloyd McKenzie Oops, I just thought I can't register Jira. I didn't even try. Maybe a later time I will try to register.
Sounds good. So will you register and submit the issue? No pressure. You can always ask for help if needed (or ask for someone else do it).

An issue has been created:
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-31536

Wow, I've already have an account and I successfully reset the password. Thanks you both @Lloyd McKenzie @Rob Hausam .
Thanks for submitting the issue. And feel free to submit more if you uncover other problems :)
Got it.:big_smile:
